intro: Bomarea salsilla, commonly known as the Salsilla bomarea, is a flowering plant native to the Andean regions of South America. It typically grows as a herbaceous perennial with rhizomatous stems. Bomarea salsilla is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its vibrant foliage and unique floral display.
